definition: to stand out (among a group)/distinguished

variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
suffix for nouns

the shot hits the bird that pokes its head out (idiom)/nonconformity gets punished

sentences.english: Still we don't know what's yet to come…
sentences.chinese: 我为什么要来当出头鸟呢？

sentences.english: What is your individual trait that makes you stick out like a sore thumb in these situations?
sentences.chinese: 可是你的哪些个性特征让你在这些场合里成了出头鸟？
